mapper.update: UPDATE category SET category_name = #{name},category_parent_id = #{parentId} WHERE category_id = #{cid}
mapper.select: SELECT c1.category_id AS cid,c1.category_name AS `name`,c1.category_parent_id AS parentId,c1.category_level AS clevel,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM category c2 WHERE c1.category_id = c2.category_parent_id ) AS pexist FROM category c1
SELECT count(0) FROM brand b INNER JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id INNER JOIN goods g ON b.brand_id = g.brand_id WHERE c.category_id = #{cid}
SELECT category_name AS `name`,category_id AS id,category_parent_id AS pid FROM category WHERE category_level !=#{cLevel}
